title: Josh Duhamel, 46, packs on PDA with former beauty queen Audra Mari, 26, at Toronto Airport
text:
He split from his wife Fergie two years ago.

And now it seems that Josh Duhamel has found love again.

The actor, 46, was seen at Toronto Airport on Thursday packing on the PDA with former beauty queen Audra Mari, 25.

Couple alert: Josh Duhamel was at Toronto Airport on Thursday to meet former beauty queen Audra Mari who flew to the Canadian city to meet up with him

Together again: The actor, 46, and the model, 26, seemed incredibly happy to be reunited

The pair were first linked back in May when they were seen together at Nobu in Malibu.

On May 31, Fergie, 44, officially filed for divorce.

It seems that Mari flew to Toronto to meet up with Duhamel, who is filming his new Netflix series Jupiter's Legacy in the Canadian city.

They had clearly been missing each other as they hugged and kissed oblivious to everything around them in the busy terminal.

They then exited the building walking arm in arm with Mari snuggling up to her boyfriend.

Packed on the PDA: They hugged and kissed oblivious to everything around them in the busy terminal

Look to be in love: Mari tenderly touched her boyfriend's face as he leaned in for a kiss

Serious: The pair were first linked back in May when they were spotted together at celebrity hotspot Nobu in Malibu. On May 31, Duhamel's estranged wife Fergie filed for divorce

Duhamel was dressed in a white tee and gray jeans along with a black padded jacket and a backwards baseball cap.

Mari had on a beige jacket with a belt knotted at the waist and a pair of skintight black leggings.

She pulled a large silver suitcase on wheels and carried a large black holdall on a shoulder strap as well as a small black purse on a long gold chain.

The couple, who both hail from North Dakota, have not yet publicly spoken about their romance.

Loved up: The couple, who both hail from North Dakota, couldn't keep their hands off each other. They have not yet publicly spoken about their romance

Heading home: They then exited the building walking arm in arm with Mari snuggling up to Duhamel. The actor is filming his new Netflix series Jupiter's legacy in Toronto

Mari, who is half Filippino, won Miss World America in 2016 and placed 11th at Miss World the same year and is signed with Los Angeles modeling agency Vision LA

She had previously won Miss North Dakota USA 2014 as well as placing 1st runner-up at the Miss USA 2014 pageant.

Duhamel and Fergie tied the knot in 2005 after five years of dating and welcomed their son Axl in 2013.

The two have continued to co-parent their child since separating in September 2017.

In her divorce petition, the former Black Eyed Peas frontwoman requested to change her name back to her birth name Stacy Ann Ferguson.
